title: EKIN - Singapore - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: Create and implement education plans through the effective use of our samples, seeding, product trials, training tools and collateral. Create and conduct training clinics covering new seasonal...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
